title: Disney Parks After Dark: Be Our Guest

locations.name: beast’s castle at magic kingdom park

text:
The live-action film “ Beauty and the Beast ” officially opens in theaters on March 17, and to celebrate, we’re taking a look at the Be Our Guest Restaurant in tonight’s “ Disney Parks After Dark ” series.
This guest-favorite restaurant is located at the foot of Beast’s Castle at Magic Kingdom Park , and offers up quick-service meals during breakfast and lunch, as well as table-service dinners. The restaurant offers three different dining rooms themed in exquisite detail inspired by the film. The Grand Ballroom allows guests to dine in the Beast’s ballroom with a high ceiling and photo-worthy chandeliers. The Castle Gallery puts on display mementos of Belle and Beast’s relationship, and the West Wing offers a spooky look at the enchanted rose from the film.
The restaurant’s exterior, photographed above, appears rocky and ominous – but one only has to open the door to find the treasure of beauty on the inside. 
Thanks to photographer Tom Bricker for the image.
